sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import { signUpUser } from "../../../redux/action-creators"; import Country from "../../../assets/Country_codes/Country_codes"; import { Container,Row,Col25,InputFormTxt,LabelForm,InputFormSub,ErrorPForm } from '../../../components/styled/Login.styled'; const SignupUser = () => { const [countryCode, setCountryCode] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const { error } = useSelector((state) => state.authenticationReducer); const schema = yup.object().shape({ email: yup.string().email().required(), password: yup.string().min(8).max(16).required().matches( /^(?=.*[A-Za-z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*#?&])[A-Za-z\d@$!%*#?&]{8,}$/, "Must Contain 8 Characters, One Uppercase, One Lowercase, One Number and one special case Character" ), password_confirm: yup.string().min(8).max(16).required().oneOf([yup.ref('password'), null], 'Passwords must match'), name:yup.string().required(), last_name:yup.string().required(), phone:yup.string().required() }) const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema) }); const handleChangeCode = (value)=>{ setCountryCode(value) console.log("value",value) } const onSubmit = (d) =>{ const result ={ name:d.name, last_name:d.last_name, password:d.password, // email:d.email, phone:d.phone, } dispatch(signUpUser(result, history)); } return (
Name {errors.name?.message} {error && error.name} Last Name {errors.last_name?.message} {error && error.last_name} Phone {errors.phone?.message} {error && error.phone} Email {errors.email?.message} {error && error.email} Password {errors.pawword?.message} {error && error.pawword} Confirm Password {errors.password_confirm?.message} {error && error.password_confirm} Already Have an account?
); }; export default SignupUser;
